form_fields.label: DB Cache Size (In mb)
form_fields.hint: Set database cache size in megabytes; machines sync faster with a larger cache. Recommend setting as high as possible based upon machine's available RAM. Default 450 Mb.

form_fields.label: Max Mempool Size (In mb)
form_fields.hint: Keep the transaction memory pool below <n> megabytes. Default 300 Mb.

form_fields.label: Listen for Incoming Connections (0 disabled / 1 enabled)
form_fields.hint: Accept incoming connections from peers. Default disabled.

form_fields.label: Max Peer Connections
form_fields.hint: Maintain at most N connections to peers. Default 125.
